homePage.headline: Capturing Moments, One shot at a time
homePage.subtext: Welcome to my photography portfolio - a collection of memories, emotions and light

aboutPage.text1: I'm passionate photographer who finds beauty in everyday moments. Whether I'm capturing landscapes, portraits, or candid street sceenes, I aim to tell authentic stories through light, texture, and emotion.
aboutPage.text2: With a background in [Your background here], I approach photography as both an art and a form of connection. My goal is to make viewers feel something - to pause, reflect, and see the world a little differently.
